name: barrier
description:
The barrier command extracts barrier features from OSM data. Categories include:

- Linear: fences, walls, hedges, retaining walls, guard rails
- Access: gates, lift gates, toll booths, cattle grids, stiles
- Blocking: bollards, blocks, jersey barriers, chains
- Traffic: speed bumps, chicanes, rumble strips

Calculates length for linear barriers.

options.-t, --type: Filter by barrier type (fence, wall, gate, etc.)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: linear, access, blocking, traffic
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Barrier features with:
- barrier: Barrier type
- material: Construction material
- height: Barrier height
- access: Access restrictions
- bicycle: Bicycle access
- foot: Pedestrian access
- length_m: Length in meters (for linear barriers)
